name: WBC
tag_list: westminster-business-consultants, junior-enterprise, market-research, web-development, event-management, marketing-consultancy, business-consultancy, university-of-westminster, london
overview:
WBC is a Business Consultancy offering four different services: Market Research, Business and Marketing Consultancy, Web Development and Event Management.

These services are offered to a range of international and national small and medium enterprises within different industries, as well as blue chip companies and the University of Westminster.

Westminster Business Consultants (WBC) is a dynamic Junior Enterprise run by students of the University of Westminster. JADE UK was founded in 2003 by WBC as part of JADE, a pan-European network consisting of over 225 Junior Enterprises. JADEâ€™s partner network BrasilJunior and associations with similar initiatives in Asia provide a platform for commercial projects and knowledge sharing on a broader international level.

Providing a dynamic results-oriented service, WBC adheres to the high standards reflected in its Mission Statement. By embracing professionalism, team-work and quality, WBC has been awarded with a Certificate for Quality by the European Confederation of Junior Enterprises. Students who work at WBC are well informed and up to date with the latest techniques in their fields. Our consultants have fresh ideas and are motivated and disciplined, enabling us to offer quality services while keeping costs down.
